Package edu.cpp.cs.cs141.assignment2

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Agent
    Interface for ultimately creating classes such as Player and Enemy
    Item
    Interface to represent abstraction of items that can be obtained in Escape the Dungeon!
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmmoPack
    Represents an ammopack in Escape the Dungeon!
    Character
    Abstract class intended for Player and Enemy classes
    Enemy
    Represents an enemy in game
    GameEngine
    Handles game logic and brings everything together
    Gun
    Gun abstracting a gun in Escape the Dungeon!
    ItemDrop
    Shared methods and attributes of all dropable items in Escape the Dungeon!
    Main
    Create GameEngine object and run Escape the Dungeon!
    MedKit
    Represents a medkit in Escape the Dungeon! that can be used to restore health
    Pistol
    Represents a pistol in game which is a type of gun
    Player
    Represents the user's character he controls in game
    Rifle
    Represents a rifle in game which is a type of gun
    Shotgun
    Represents a shotgun in game which is a type of gun
    UI
    User Interface (text-based) to display info to user and get user input
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    COMBAT_ACTION
    All possible actions the player can take while in combat
    GAME_AGENT
    All possible Agents that can be present in game
    GAME_GUN
    Contains enumeration of guns to access their names
